entry.title: off-topic: bitcoin-forum...
entry.summary: In a conversation dated February 19, 2012, Michael Gronager sought an answer to his question on BitcoinTalk forum. He wondered whether he needed to be whitelisted and if that was the reason for his inability to post on the platform. The post he referred to suggested that whitelisting was necessary for posting privileges on the forum. However, it is unclear whether this was the exact cause of his problem.
